attributes.action: undertake rapid assessment and then implementation of a policy to address the country's inadequate infrastructure for workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Persistent slow & costly commuting of all types leaves working commuters frustrated, tired & less fit for work & home life.
  
The following/ reasonable alternatives are to be considered singly/ combination:
i) 2 tier trains (lowering tracks &/ or raising bridges where need be)
ii) no road freighting in day light or at least commuting hours (6-9am and 4-8pm).
iii) mandatory cycle carriage on trains in & out of London & other cities.
iv) a 30 min period of grace from parking & other fines/ disincentives or rules in order to allow weary drivers to stop at city (inc London) centre cafes to refresh themselves before continuing their commute.
 
This petition needs your support and government action.  Please sign it.
